solution_line_template: The amount of money Diana earned in August is {august_multiplier} * ${july_earnings} = $<<{august_multiplier}*{july_earnings}={august_earnings}>>{august_earnings}.
The amount of money Diana earned in September is {september_multiplier} * ${august_earnings} = $<<{september_multiplier}*{august_earnings}={september_earnings}>>{september_earnings}.

The total amount of money Diana earned over the three months is ${july_earnings} + ${august_earnings} + ${september_earnings} = $<<{july_earnings}+{august_earnings}+{september_earnings}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}.
